OT-description: I started to dive into Front-end half a year ago and thanks to RSSchool I understood that it really interests me. Studying process was really tough but interesting since we didn't just learn theory but got real skills. I am aimed at keep on learning.
AK-description: I've been learning Front-end for a year. Before that I was far from coding, but I am aimed at switching my career. I am sure that I will manage.
